visual.name: pbiCollage
visual.description: A timeline display for photos or images in the style of Instagram

ja-JP.optionsFieldMapping: フィールドマッピング
ja-JP.descDisplayAsGrid: Display images as a summary grid or as a detailed list
ja-JP.descInsertBreaks: Replace carriage returns with html breaks
ja-JP.descLaunchExternalUrls: Allow the visual to open external links

displayAsGrid.description: Display images as a summary grid or as a detailed list

limitCaption.description: Limit caption length to first sentence

insertBreaks.description: Replace carriage returns with html breaks

launchExternalUrls.description: Allow the visual to open external links
